Title: Rush
Overview: In the 1970s, a rivalry propels race car drivers Niki Lauda and James Hunt to fame and glory — until a horrible accident threatens to end it all.
Keywords: world champion, sport, racing car, formula 1, automobile racing, based on true events
production_companies: Revolution Films, Working Title Films, Cross Creek Pictures, Exclusive Media Group, Double Negative
Cast: Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde
